article: One day, I was walking with my daughter, and we saw a man picking bottles out of garbage cans . He did not ask us for spare _ , like others had before him. I told her he had his dignity , and was doing what he could to help _ My daughter had a 2-dollar _ I had given her, and she told me she _ to give her money to this man _ she thought he needed it more than she _ . He _ us loudly as we left the store, and _ God to bless us. The kindness was _ to my daughter. When she got to the _ a couple of months later, she _ she had left her _ at home and it happened that I had not taken my purse along, _ . Then a lady noticed us and saw how _ my daughter was.
